mapper.insert: insert into board_like (lno ,goods_id , member_id, like_type) values((select nvl(max(lno)+1,0) from board_like), #{goods_id}, #{member_id}, #{like_type})
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where goods_id = #{goods_id} and member_id = #{member_id} and like_type = #{like_type}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_like where goods_id = #{goods_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
